page.title: 18Tourism
page.content: TOURISM The block is only lightly affected by tourism. Hotel accomodation at the Pilgrim Hotel on the A49 is available with 19 rooms. The Axe and Cleaver also offers limited accomodation, and holiday cottages are available at Poolespringe Farm. Some bed and breakfast accomodation is available in the area. There is a Caravan Club certified site at Park Hall, taking a maximum of 5 touring caravans. There is little other than the views of the area or the beautiful countryside to attract the tourist, but some walkers enjoy the Green Lanes that run through and around the block.
